#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int N;
int count = 0;
int maze[10][10];
int path[10][10];

void allmazeSolver(int x, int y)
{
    if(x == N-1 && y == N-1)
    {
        count++;
    }

     path[x][y] = 1;

    if(x+1<N && maze[x+1][y] == 0 && path[x+1][y] == 0)
    {
        allmazeSolver(x+1, y);
    }
    if(y+1<N && maze[x][y+1] == 0 && path[x][y+1] == 0)
    {
        allmazeSolver(x, y+1);
    }
    if(x-1>=0 && maze[x-1][y] == 0 && path[x-1][y] == 0)
    {
        allmazeSolver(x-1, y);
    }
    if(y-1>=0 && maze[x][y-1] == 0 && path[x][y-1] == 0)
    {
        allmazeSolver(x, y-1);
    }

    path[x][y] = 0;
}

int main()
{
    cin >> N;
    for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
    {
      for(int j = 0; j < N; j++)
      {
          scanf("%d",&maze[i][j]);
          path[i][j] = 0;
      }
    }
    allmazeSolver(0,0);
    cout << count;
	return 0;
}
